channel.title: Rune Remake (2006 Remake)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/1Hi11.png[/img]
Website: [url=http://www.Rune-Remake.com]www.Rune-Remake.com[/url]
Rune-Remake is a remake of Runescape in 2006. It is currently in Alpha stages V1.2. Rune Remake is still in development but we make weekly updates on the forums.
[img]http://puu.sh/1HFKK[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1HFLc[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1Js3j.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1Js3t.png[/img]
More images on our website
Features:
Combat: *PvP fully complete *Perfect max hit formulas *Perfect accuracy formula *Equipment requirements
Magic: *Every modern combat spell *Can't mage through walls *Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working *Bones to bananas *Bones to Peache's *Weakening spells *bind, snare, entangle *Teleports, teleothers *Alching *Superheat *Enchanting jewelry
Prayer: *All bones bury-able *Every prayer working properly *Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
Mining: *Emptying and refilling rocks *All ores can be mined *Correct pickaxe finding and animations *Prospecting *Random chance of obtaining gems *Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
Firemaking: *All logs light able *Adding and depleting of lightened logs *Ashes appear after logs burn out *Correct animations *Clipped
Woodcutting: *Stumps and regrowing trees *Correct hatchet finding *Correct hatchet animations *All trees cutable
Crafting: 40% *Cutting gems *Making amulets, necklaces, and rings *Stringing amulets *Tanning normal and hard leather *Crafting normal and hard leather.. *Spinning wool *Making pottery
Cooking: *All fish can be cooked *All meats can be cooked *Grinding wheat into flour *Cakes *Pies *Pizza *Stew *Wine *Correct burning formula *Lumbridge cooking range bonus *Eating food (in pieces) *Correct animation and timing used
Rune Crafting:
*Multiple rune crafting *All alters *Pouches *Talisman Locating
Quests: Cook's Assistant Doric's Quest
Black Knights' Fortress
Tutorial Island: *RuneScape Instructor *Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor *Cooking instructor *Quest instructor *Mining/Smithing instructor *Combat instructor *Money instructor *Prayer instructor *Magic instructor *Correct hint arrows *Doors[/center]

item.title: Rune Remake (2006 Remake)

item.title: Rune Remake (2006 Remake)
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Remake Rune Remake
item.description:
@Rune_Remake wrote:

[center]

Website: www.Rune-Remake.com

Rune-Remake is a remake of Runescape in 2006. It is currently in Alpha stages V1.2. Rune Remake is still in development but we make weekly updates on the forums.




More images on our website

Features:

Combat:
*PvP fully complete
*Perfect max hit formulas
*Perfect accuracy formula
*Equipment requirements

Magic:
*Every modern combat spell
*Can’t mage through walls
*Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working
*Bones to bananas
*Bones to Peache’s
*Weakening spells
*bind, snare, entangle
*Teleports, teleothers
*Alching
*Superheat
*Enchanting jewelry

Prayer:
*All bones bury-able
*Every prayer working properly
*Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate

Mining:
*Emptying and refilling rocks
*All ores can be mined
*Correct pickaxe finding and animations
*Prospecting
*Random chance of obtaining gems
*Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms

Firemaking:
*All logs light able
*Adding and depleting of lightened logs
*Ashes appear after logs burn out
*Correct animations
*Clipped

Woodcutting:
*Stumps and regrowing trees
*Correct hatchet finding
*Correct hatchet animations
*All trees cutable

Crafting: 40%
*Cutting gems
*Making amulets, necklaces, and rings
*Stringing amulets
*Tanning normal and hard leather
*Crafting normal and hard leather…
*Spinning wool
*Making pottery

Cooking:
*All fish can be cooked
*All meats can be cooked
*Grinding wheat into flour
*Cakes
*Pies
*Pizza
*Stew
*Wine
*Correct burning formula
*Lumbridge cooking range bonus
*Eating food (in pieces)
*Correct animation and timing used

Rune Crafting:

*Multiple rune crafting
*All alters
*Pouches
*Talisman Locating

Quests:
Cook’s Assistant
Doric’s Quest

Black Knights’ Fortress

Tutorial Island:
*RuneScape Instructor
*Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor
*Cooking instructor
*Quest instructor
*Mining/Smithing instructor
*Combat instructor
*Money instructor
*Prayer instructor
*Magic instructor
*Correct hint arrows
*Doors[/center]

Read full topic
